    • Uses of GameState in edu.harvard.cs262.GameServer

      Methods in edu.harvard.cs262.GameServer that return GameState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GameState GameServer.getState()
      To pull this server's impression of the entire game, one can call this method and be returned an GameState of what this server thinks is the current situation.
      Methods in edu.harvard.cs262.GameServer with parameters of type GameState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean GameServer.setState(GameState state)
      This method would be called to update this server's impression of the current game.

    • Uses of GameState in edu.harvard.cs262.GameServer.GameClusterServer

      Methods in edu.harvard.cs262.GameServer.GameClusterServer with parameters of type GameState 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean GameClusterServer.setState(GameState state)
      To make sure the game state is consistent and replicated across all slaves, setState is called to update the state of a peer that may be behind.
